sentences.english: As a constitutional federal republic, the United States is not unique.
sentences.chinese: 美国的宪政民主共和制并不独特。

sentences.english: This separation of powers between the Executive and the Legislature is part of the constitution's checks and balances.
sentences.chinese: 这是行政立法两权分立相互制衡的宪政架构。

sentences.english: Please describe the relationship between Christianity and western constitutionalism .
sentences.chinese: 请阐述基督教和西方宪政之间的关系。

sentences.english: The constitutional government to be promoted is new-democratic constitutional government.
sentences.chinese: 目前准备实行的宪政，应该是新民主主义的宪政。

sentences.english: The constitutional government to be promoted is new-democratic constitutional government.
sentences.chinese: 目前准备实行的宪政，应该是新民主主义的宪政。

sentences.english: At last, the new constitutionalists pointed out a new direction for developing the "citizen virtue".
sentences.chinese: 最后，新宪政论为培养“公民美德”指出了新的方向。

sentences.english: Natural economy and planned economy can't bring about constitutionalism.
sentences.chinese: 自然经济和计划经济不可能产生宪政。

sentences.english: This situation profoundly influenced the development of Western constitutionalism.
sentences.chinese: 此状况深刻影响了西方宪政主义的发展。

sentences.english: The amending power is also an important power in constitutional country.
sentences.chinese: 修宪权是宪政法治国家的重要权力。

sentences.english: The procuratorial organ is natural anti-corruption and anti-bribery organization under Chinese constitutional government system.
sentences.chinese: 检察机关是中国宪政体制下的当然的反贪污贿赂机构。

sentences.english: Financial constitutionalism is the important part of modern national constitutionalism construction.
sentences.chinese: 财政立宪是现代国家宪政建设的重要内容。

sentences.english: The Constitutional Compilation Bureau was an important organization founded in the course of constitutional reform.
sentences.chinese: 宪政编查馆是在宪政改革中设立的一个重要机构。

sentences.english: The Constitutional Compilation Bureau was an important organization founded in the course of constitutional reform.
sentences.chinese: 宪政编查馆是在宪政改革中设立的一个重要机构。

sentences.english: They display the sheep's head of constitutional government while selling the dog-meat of one-party dictatorship.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在挂宪政的羊头，卖一党专政的狗肉。

sentences.english: Citizenship cannot be separated from the right of equality, which constitutes an important part of constitution and constitutionalism.
sentences.chinese: 公民离不开平等权，平等权是宪法与宪政的重要内容。

sentences.english: The two concepts, constitutionalism and government under law, have close connection.
sentences.chinese: 宪政和政府法治是关系密切的两个概念。

definition: system of constitutional government/(used as an attributive) constitutional
Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People (late 1890s)
